verses.verse: Now these are the last <WH314> words <WH1697> of David <WH1732>. David <WH1732> the son <WH1121> of Jesse <WH3448> saith <WH5002>, And the man <WH1397> who was raised <WH6965> on high <WH5920> saith <WH5002>, The anointed <WH4899> of the God <WH430> of Jacob <WH3290>, And the sweet <WH5273> psalmist <WH2158> of Israel <WH3478>:
The Spirit <WH7307> of Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> by me <WH4405>, And his word was upon my tongue <WH3956>.

The God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> said <WH559>, The Rock <WH6697> of Israel <WH3478> spake <WH1696> to me <WH4910>: One that ruleth over men <WH120> righteously <WH6662>, That ruleth <WH4910> in the fear <WH3374> of God <WH430>,

He shall be as the light <WH216> of the morning <WH1242>, when the sun <WH8121> riseth <WH2224>, A morning <WH1242> without <WH3808> clouds <WH5645>, When the tender grass <WH1877> springeth out of the earth <WH776>, Through clear shining <WH5051> after rain <WH4306>.

Verily my house <WH1004> is not so with God <WH410>; Yet he hath made <WH7760> with me an everlasting <WH5769> covenant <WH1285>, Ordered <WH6186> in all things <WH8104>, and sure: For it is all my salvation <WH3468>, and all my desire <WH2656>, Although he maketh it not to grow <WH6779>.
But the ungodly <WH1100> shall be all of them as thorns <WH6975> to be thrust away <WH5074>, Because they cannot be taken <WH3947> with the hand <WH3027>;

But the man <WH376> that toucheth <WH5060> them Must be armed <WH4390> with iron <WH1270> and the staff <WH6086> of a spear <WH2595>: And they shall be utterly <WH8313> burned <WH8313> with fire <WH784> in their place <WH7675>.

These are the names <WH8034> of the mighty men <WH1368> whom David <WH1732> had <WH7675>: Josheb-basshebeth <WH3427> a Tahchemonite <WH8461>, chief <WH7218> of the captains <WH7991>; the same was Adino <WH5722> the Eznite <WH6112>, against eight <WH8083> hundred <WH3967> slain <WH2491> at one <WH259> time <WH6471>.

And after <WH310> him was Eleazar <WH499> the son <WH1121> of Dodai <WH1734> the son of an Ahohite <WH266>, one of the three <WH7969> mighty men <WH1368> with David <WH1732>, when they defied <WH2778> the Philistines <WH6430> that were there gathered together <WH622> to battle <WH4421>, and the men <WH376> of Israel <WH3478> were gone away <WH5927>.

He arose <WH6965>, and smote <WH5221> the Philistines <WH6430> until <WH3588> his hand <WH3027> was weary <WH3021>, and his hand <WH3027> clave <WH1692> unto the sword <WH2719>; and Jehovah <WH3068> wrought <WH6213> a great <WH1419> victory <WH8668> that day <WH3117>; and the people <WH5971> returned <WH7725> after <WH310> him only to take spoil <WH6584>.

And after <WH310> him was Shammah <WH8048> the son <WH1121> of Agee <WH89> a Hararite <WH2043>. And the Philistines <WH6430> were gathered together <WH622> into a troop <WH2416>, where was a plot <WH2513> of ground <WH7704> full <WH4392> of lentils <WH5742>; and the people <WH5971> fled <WH5127> from <WH6440> the Philistines <WH6430>.

But he stood <WH3320> in the midst <WH8432> of the plot <WH2513>, and defended <WH5337> it <WH5221>, and slew the Philistines <WH6430>; and Jehovah <WH3068> wrought <WH6213> a great <WH1419> victory <WH8668>.

And three <WH7969> of the thirty <WH7970> chief <WH7218> men went down <WH3381>, and came <WH935> to David <WH1732> in the harvest time <WH7105> unto the cave <WH4631> of Adullam <WH5725>; and the troop <WH2416> of the Philistines <WH6430> was encamped <WH2583> in the valley <WH6010> of Rephaim <WH7497>.
And David <WH1732> was then in the stronghold <WH4686>; and the garrison <WH4673> of the Philistines <WH6430> was then in Beth-lehem <WH1035>.
And David <WH1732> longed <WH183>, and said <WH559>, Oh that one would give me water <WH4325> to drink <WH8248> of the well <WH953> of Beth-lehem <WH1035>, which is by the gate <WH8179>!

And the three <WH7969> mighty men <WH1368> brake through <WH1234> the host <WH4264> of the Philistines <WH6430>, and drew <WH7579> water <WH4325> out of the well <WH953> of Beth-lehem <WH1035>, that was by the gate <WH8179>, and took <WH5375> it <WH935>, and brought it to David <WH1732>: but he would <WH14> not drink <WH8354> thereof <WH5258>, but poured it out unto Jehovah <WH3068>.

And he said <WH559>, Be it far <WH2486> from me <WH3068>, O Jehovah, that I should do <WH6213> this <WH1818>: shall I drink the blood of the men <WH582> that went <WH1980> in jeopardy of their lives <WH5315>? therefore he would <WH14> not drink <WH8354> it <WH6213>. These things did the three <WH7969> mighty men <WH1368>.

And Abishai <WH52>, the brother <WH251> of Joab <WH3097>, the son <WH1121> of Zeruiah <WH6870>, was chief <WH7218> of the three <WH7992>. And he lifted up <WH5782> his spear <WH2595> against three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> and slew <WH2491> them <WH8034>, and had a name among the three <WH7969>.
Was he not most honorable <WH3513> of the three <WH7969>? therefore he was made their captain <WH8269>: howbeit he attained <WH935> not unto the first three <WH7969>.

And Benaiah <WH1141> the son <WH1121> of Jehoiada <WH3077>, the son <WH1121> of a valiant <WH2428> man <WH376> of Kabzeel <WH6909>, who had done mighty <WH7227> deeds <WH6467>, he slew <WH5221> the two <WH8147> sons <WH739> of Ariel of Moab <WH4124>: he went down <WH3381> also and slew <WH5221> a lion <WH738> in the midst <WH8432> of a pit <WH953> in time <WH3117> of snow <WH7950>.

And he slew <WH2026> an Egyptian <WH4713>, a goodly <WH4758> man <WH376>: and the Egyptian <WH4713> had a spear <WH2595> in his hand <WH3027>; but he went down <WH3381> to him with a staff <WH7626>, and plucked <WH1497> the spear <WH2595> out of the Egyptian <WH4713>'s hand <WH3027>, and slew <WH5221> him with his own spear <WH2595>.
These things did <WH6213> Benaiah <WH1141> the son <WH1121> of Jehoiada <WH3077>, and had a name <WH8034> among the three <WH7969> mighty men <WH1368>.
He was more honorable <WH3513> than the thirty <WH7970>, but he attained <WH935> not to the first three <WH7969>. And David <WH1732> set <WH7760> him over his guard <WH4928>.
Asahel <WH6214> the brother <WH251> of Joab <WH3097> was one of the thirty <WH7970>; Elhanan <WH445> the son <WH1121> of Dodo <WH1734> of Beth-lehem <WH1035>,
Shammah <WH8048> the Harodite <WH2733>, Elika <WH470> the Harodite <WH2733>,
Helez <WH2503> the Paltite <WH6407>, Ira <WH5896> the son <WH1121> of Ikkesh <WH6142> the Tekoite <WH8621>,
Abiezer <WH44> the Anathothite <WH6069>, Mebunnai <WH4012> the Hushathite <WH2843>,
Zalmon <WH6756> the Ahohite <WH266>, Maharai <WH4121> the Netophathite <WH5200>,
Heleb <WH2460> the son <WH1121> of Baanah <WH1196> the Netophathite <WH5200>, Ittai <WH863> the son <WH1121> of Ribai <WH7380> of Gibeah <WH1390> of the children <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144>,
Benaiah <WH1141> a Pirathonite <WH6553>, Hiddai <WH1914> of the brooks <WH5158> of Gaash <WH1608>.
Abialbon <WH45> the Arbathite <WH6164>, Azmaveth <WH5820> the Barhumite <WH1273>,
Eliahba <WH455> the Shaalbonite <WH8170>, the sons <WH1121> of Jashen <WH3464>, Jonathan <WH3083>,
Shammah <WH8048> the Hararite <WH2043>, Ahiam <WH279> the son <WH1121> of Sharar <WH8325> the Ararite <WH2043>,
Eliphelet <WH467> the son <WH1121> of Ahasbai <WH308>, the son <WH1121> of the Maacathite <WH4602>, Eliam <WH463> the son <WH1121> of Ahithophel <WH302> the Gilonite <WH1526>,
Hezro <WH2695> the Carmelite <WH3761>, Paarai <WH6474> the Arbite <WH701>,
Igal <WH3008> the son <WH1121> of Nathan <WH5416> of Zobah <WH6678>, Bani <WH1137> the Gadite <WH1425>,
Zelek <WH6768> the Ammonite <WH5984>, Naharai <WH5171> the Beerothite <WH886>, armorbearers <WH5375> to Joab <WH3097> the son <WH1121> of Zeruiah <WH6870>,
Ira <WH5896> the Ithrite <WH3505>, Gareb <WH1619> the Ithrite <WH3505>,
Uriah <WH223> the Hittite <WH2850>: thirty <WH7970> and seven in all <WH7651>.
